New Records: Manny Machado tied Nate Colbert's 50-year old record for career home runs with the San Diego Padres with his 163rd homer
Key Match Events: Manny Machado hit two home runs, one of which tied the Padres' career home run record. Michael Conforto hit a home run for the Giants.
Pre-Game Insights: The Padres were playing to gain ground in the National League playoff race, going up by 1 1/2 games over Arizona for the top wild-card spot as the Diamondbacks lost.
Post-Match Reflections: The Padres won for the fourth time in five games, drawing within four games of first-place Los Angeles in the NL West after the Dodgers took a 3-1 home loss to the Cleveland Guardians.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the San Diego Padres' home stadium.
Others: The Padres' starting pitcher, Michael King, fanned eight in six innings and limited San Francisco to one run on six hits and a walk. Three relievers threw hitless ball over the last three innings.
